Key Match Events: Indiana Pacers broke a 56-all halftime tie with the first five points of the second half
Pacers used a pivotal 40-point third quarter to seize control
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Mike Budenholzer is still waiting for his 500th win
The Pacers have finally started playing the way they envisioned over the past 11 games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tyrese Haliburton did not commit a turnover for the second straight game
Indiana has won three of its last four games to even its overall record at 18-18
Others: Kevin Durant led the Suns with 25 points, seven rebounds, and seven assists
Devin Booker had 20 points, nine rebounds, and nine assists in the same venue he scored an arena-record 62 in his last trip to Gainbridge Fieldhouse in January 2024
